Raw Processor

Source: R/Processor_raw.R
RawProcessor.Rd

Processor that returns raw values without any transformation. Inherits from FeatureProcessor.

Super classes

RHealth::Processor -> RHealth::FeatureProcessor -> RawProcessor

Methods

Public methods

  • RawProcessor$process()

  • RawProcessor$size()

  • RawProcessor$print()

  • RawProcessor$clone()

Inherited methods
  • RHealth::Processor$load()
  • RHealth::Processor$save()
  • RHealth::FeatureProcessor$fit()

Method process()

Return the raw input as-is.

Usage

RawProcessor$process(value)

Arguments

value

A raw field value (any type).

Returns

The unmodified input.

Method size()

Optional: Return size/dimension of processed output.

Usage

RawProcessor$size()

Returns

NULL

Method print()

Print a string representation of the processor.

Usage

RawProcessor$print(...)

Arguments

...

Ignored.

Returns

A character string

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

RawProcessor$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
